Come on guys, that sh*t ain't hard :)

Kill all bots = bot_kill

Add bots = bot_add_t or bot_add_ct or simply just write bot_add and it will add to t's, then ct's etc.. 
Or you can just write bot_quota and a number to add a number of bots.

Hope this helps :)
